entity.name: wiki
entity.query: SELECT name, TIMESTAMP 'epoch' + max(time) * INTERVAL '1s' AS modified, max(version) AS version FROM wiki GROUP BY name
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT DISTINCT name FROM wiki WHERE time > EXTRACT( epoch FROM TIMESTAMP '${dataimporter.wiki.last_index_time}' )
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT name, TIMESTAMP 'epoch' + max(time) * INTERVAL '1s' AS modified, max(version) AS version FROM wiki WHERE name = '${dataimporter.delta.id}' GROUP BY name

entity.name: wiki_creation
entity.query: SELECT author AS creator, TIMESTAMP 'epoch' + time * INTERVAL '1s' AS created FROM wiki WHERE name = '${wiki.name}' AND version = 1

entity.name: wiki_collaborators
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT author AS collaborator FROM wiki WHERE name = '${wiki.name}' AND author != ''

entity.name: content
entity.query: SELECT text AS content FROM wiki WHERE name = '${wiki.name}' AND version = '${wiki.version}'

entity.name: ticket
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT id FROM ticket WHERE time > EXTRACT( epoch FROM TIMESTAMP '${dataimporter.ticket.last_index_time}' )
entity.query: SELECT id, summary, description, milestone, priority, component, version, severity, reporter, owner, status, TIMESTAMP 'epoch' + time * INTERVAL '1s' AS created, TIMESTAMP 'epoch' + changetime * INTERVAL '1s' AS modified FROM ticket

entity.name: ticket_collaborator
ticket_keywords
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT REGEXP_SPLIT_TO_TABLE(keywords, ',|\\s') AS keyword FROM ticket WHERE id = ${ticket.id} AND keywords != ''

entity.name: ticket_comments
entity.query: SELECT newvalue AS comment FROM ticket_change WHERE ticket = ${ticket.id} AND field = 'comment'

entity.name: changeset
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT rev FROM revision WHERE time > EXTRACT( epoch FROM TIMESTAMP '${dataimporter.changeset.last_index_time}' )
entity.query: SELECT rev AS revision, author AS creator, author AS collaborator, TIMESTAMP 'epoch' + time * INTERVAL '1s' AS created, message FROM revision

entity.name: thread
entity.deltaQuery: SELECT thread_id AS id FROM super_archives_message GROUP BY thread_id HAVING max(received_time) > '${dataimporter.thread.last_index_time}'
entity.deltaImportQuery: SELECT sam.thread_id AS id, sat.subject_token AS name, sat.latest_message_id, saml.name AS mailinglist, array_to_string(array_agg(sam.body), ' ') AS content FROM super_archives_message AS sam JOIN super_archives_thread AS sat ON sat.id = sam.thread_id JOIN super_archives_mailinglist AS saml ON sat.mailinglist_id = saml.id WHERE sat.id = '${dataimporter.delta.id}' GROUP BY sam.thread_id, sat.subject_token, sat.latest_message_id, saml.name
entity.query: SELECT sam.thread_id AS id, sat.subject_token AS name, sat.latest_message_id, saml.name AS mailinglist, array_to_string(array_agg(sam.body), ' ') AS content FROM super_archives_message AS sam JOIN super_archives_thread AS sat ON sat.id = sam.thread_id JOIN super_archives_mailinglist AS saml ON sat.mailinglist_id = saml.id GROUP BY sam.thread_id, sat.subject_token, sat.latest_message_id, saml.name

entity.name: first_message
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT ON (sam.thread_id) sam.body AS description, sam.received_time AS created, sam.subject_clean AS subject, au.username AS creator FROM super_archives_message AS sam JOIN super_archives_emailaddress AS saea ON sam.from_address_id = saea.id LEFT JOIN auth_user AS au ON au.id = saea.user_id WHERE sam.thread_id = ${thread.id} ORDER BY sam.thread_id, sam.received_time

entity.name: latest_message
entity.query: SELECT received_time AS modified FROM super_archives_message WHERE id = ${thread.latest_message_id}

entity.name: thread_collaborators
entity.query: SELECT DISTINCT au.username AS collaborator FROM super_archives_message AS sam JOIN super_archives_emailaddress AS saea ON sam.from_address_id = saea.id JOIN auth_user AS au ON au.id = saea.user_id WHERE thread_id = ${thread.id}
